description: What was the number of employees in the financial services sector in the UK in the year 2002?
Identify the year with the highest number of employees.
Determine the range of the number of employees over the years.
Calculate the average number of employees from 2001 to 2019.
Identify any year where there was a significant drop in the number of employees.
List the years where the number of employees was below 1.17 million.
Rank the years from highest to lowest based on the number of employees.
Is there a general trend in the number of employees from 2001 to 2019?
Identify clusters of years with similar numbers of employees.
Determine the percentage of years with more than 1.18 million employees.
